Title: Worldsoul: City of Threads
Description:
Xal'atath has "gifted" the nerubians with Black Blood... giving them the means to ascend into things more terrible than they were before. 

We must take advantage of the confusion in the city. Bring together your allies and get ready to infiltrate... we must put a stop to them!
ObjectivesText: Complete the City of Threads dungeon on Mythic difficulty or higher.
